issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] fmt::Debug for ScalarValue(Utf8) is always quoted
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11102](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11102). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When viewing the plans it is difficult to differentiate between a true NULL value and a quoted string like "NULL".

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11102?focusedCommentId=17257318) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9074
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9074>
